name: 1. Goldberg Maximal
description: Clean minimalist design with Inter and Source Serif Pro fonts
instructions: Maintain a clean, minimal aesthetic with crisp typography. Use blue (#2F80ED) for primary accents and soft red (#EB5757) sparingly for emphasis. Keep layouts spacious and uncluttered.

image_style.prompt: Create clean, minimalist images with simple geometric shapes and a modern aesthetic. Use blue (#2F80ED) as the primary accent color on a white background. Style should be clean, professional, and uncluttered.
